sn12.46:1.2: Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi.
sn12.46:1.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.46:2.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, so karoti so paṭisaṃvedayatī”ti?
sn12.46:2.2: “‘So karoti so paṭisaṃvedayatī’ti kho, brāhmaṇa, ayameko anto”.
sn12.46:3.1: “Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, añño karoti, añño paṭisaṃvedayatī”ti?
sn12.46:3.2: “‘Añño karoti, añño paṭisaṃvedayatī’ti kho, brāhmaṇa, ayaṃ dutiyo anto.
sn12.46:3.3: Ete te, brāhmaṇa, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti:
sn12.46:4.1: Evaṃ vutte, so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.46:4.3: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
